introduction_1: <0>幾何學的應用廣泛深刻，發展源遠流長，是數學的重要分支。中學數學課程所涵蓋的，只是簡單的「歐幾里德幾何」和以坐標系統來描述的「解析幾何」。 這些傳統的幾何學早在18世紀以前，便已發展完備。而推動近代幾何進展的「非歐幾何」和「微分幾何」卻是在19世紀以後才告面世的。 這些劃時代的幾何學不單結集了偉大的數學家如高斯、羅巴切夫斯基、黎曼和龐卡萊等對幾何的深思與創見；它們的出現更標誌著人類在幾何學上的飛躍與革新。 愛恩斯坦解構時空的「廣義相對論」正是建立在這新發展的幾何上的。</0><0>另一方面，數論在數學研究中的地位超然，是推動數學發展的主要動力之源，它極端困難的問題和精妙深刻的定理，向來是大數學家如費馬 (Fermat)、歐拉 (Euler)、高斯 (Gauss) 和黎曼 (Riemann) 等廢寢忘餐， 鍥而不捨的研究對象。時至今日，數論的研究成果不僅引人注目，而且，近十多年來在科學技術，持別是在計算機及資訊科技方面獲得越來越重要的應用。尖端的密碼學所應用的代數幾何學 (Algebraic Geometry) 與解決費馬大定理 (Fermat Last Theorem) 的橢圓曲線 (Elliptic Curves) 理論，正是數論研究所衍生而來的！</0><0>「數學英才精進課程」在這個暑期，將圍繞這些近代數學的主流課題，分別開設「近世代數初探」，「複數與解析幾何」，「離散數學導論」，「數論與密碼學」和「微分幾何初探」* 五門精采的課程，向熱衷數學，有興趣探索、理解奇妙數學世界的中學同學，介紹近代幾何及數論的入門知識。「近世代數初探」，「離散數學導論」和「複數與解析幾何」適合初次報讀的同學，不要求高等數學作預備知識，將升中四的同學，亦可藉此打好數理基礎。而「數論與密碼學」和「數論與密碼學」專為高中同學而設，同學於中四、中五數學科中，須有優異表現和濃厚興趣。同學可按個人的興趣與數學程度，選擇相應科目修讀，讓豐富新奇的數學知識伴你渡過一個有意義的暑假。</0><0>要善用暑期，要嘗試了解近代數學的發展？參加「數學英才精進課程」的暑期班是你的最佳選擇。</0>

introduction_7: <0>Geometry has a wide and profound application with a long history, serving as an important branch of mathematics. The secondary school mathematics curriculum only covers simple "Euclidean geometry" and "analytic geometry" described using coordinate systems. These traditional geometries were well-developed before the 18th century. However, the advancements in modern geometry—known as "non-Euclidean geometry" and "differential geometry"—only emerged after the 19th century. These groundbreaking geometries not only encapsulated the deep thoughts and insights of great mathematicians such as Gauss, Lobachevsky, Riemann, and Poincaré but also marked a leap and innovation in human understanding of geometry. Einstein's "general relativity", which deconstructs spacetime, is fundamentally based on these new developments in geometry.</0><0>On the other hand, number theory occupies a transcendent position in mathematical research and is a primary source of momentum for the development of mathematics. Its extremely challenging problems and profound theorems have long been the focus of tireless research by great mathematicians like Fermat, Euler, Gauss, and Riemann. To this day, the results of number theory research are not only remarkable but have also seen increasingly important applications in science and technology, particularly in computer and information technology over the past decade. Cutting-edge cryptography applies algebraic geometry and the theory of elliptic curves, which emerged from number theory research, to solve Fermat's Last Theorem.</0><0>This summer, the "Enrichment Programme for Young Mathematics Talents" will revolve around these mainstream topics in modern mathematics, offering six exciting courses: "Towards Modern Algebra", "Complex Numbers and Analytic Geometry", "Introduction to Discrete Mathematics", "Number Theory and Cryptography", "Towards Differential Geometry" and "Understanding Non-Euclidean Geometry". These courses aim to introduce secondary school students who are enthusiastic about mathematics and interested in exploring and understanding the wondrous world of mathematics to foundational knowledge in modern geometry and number theory. "Introduction to Modern Algebra", "Complex Numbers and Analytic Geometry" and "Introduction to Discrete Mathematics" are suitable for students joining this programme for the first time. In contrast, "Number Theory and Cryptography", "Towards Differential Geometry" and "Appreciation of Non-Euclidean Geometry" require students to have considerable mathematical knowledge and a strong interest in mathematics. Students can choose courses based on their interests and mathematical proficiency, allowing them to spend a meaningful summer immersed in rich and intriguing mathematical knowledge.</0><0>If you want to make good use of your summer and delve into the development of modern mathematics, attending the summer classes of the "Mathematics Talent Enhancement Program" is your best choice.</0>
remark_1: *Students who complete any course can apply for credit exemption at The Chinese University of Hong Kong in the future.
remark_2: *各科均為中文大學入學考慮元素之一。除「複數的幾何面貌」以外，完成任何一科者，如入讀中文大學，將以該等科目申請扣減課業學分。 過去亦有學生憑該等科目，獲得海外大學的學分認可。
